title: Qualcomm’s Snapdragon X70 5G Modem-RF gets new features
content:
In February, Qualcomm announced its fifth-generation 5G modem design: the Snapdragon X70. The latest modem RF system doesn’t bring substantial improvements to raw download and upload speeds, but it does offer several new features, namely, the new AI processor for enhanced performance, improved power efficiency, and more. Qualcomm has announced new features and milestones for

The post Qualcomm’s Snapdragon X70 5G Modem-RF gets new features appeared first on XDA.
description: Ahead of its commercial availability, Qualcomm has announced some new features and milestones for the Snapdragon X70 5G modem.
